content: [TextBlock(text="Here we are, back in the electric pulse of New York City. The skyline's a stark contrast to the serene peaks of Japan, yet I'm buzzing with the same creative energy. The art, the culture, the meticulousness of every Japanese experience has me thinking: How can we infuse such precision into our blockchain designs? Missed the community, though. Can't wait to share my sketches and brainstorm our next move together. #NYC #JapanInspired", type='text')]
